Label: Obligation
Resource Class: Mandatory - helpful for starting a search

Label: Purpose
Resource Class: To provide a top level set of categories for classifying the item.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Resource Class: Choose one or more terms from the list of [Resource Class Values](../ogm-aardvark/#resource-class-values) below.

Label: Commentary
Resource Class: This field is intended to help users sort between significantly different types of resources.
